attributes.action: All NHS staff to be awarded a Long Service & Good Conduct Medal
attributes.additional_details:
Having been a uniformed individual for a portion of my working life, I look on with much bemusement at how services like the Police, Fire, Prison & Armed Forces personnel recieve a long service and good conduct medal, whereas in the NHS, Doctors, Nurses, Techs, Porters and so on receive absolutely nothing.

I wish to petition you, our Government and attempt to change this strange anomaly, I personally am tired of receiving more recognition for working in Motorsport than our front line staff
attributes.background: At this time of national and international crisis and what appears to be a wave of public out pouring of gratitude to all grades within the NHS , create a LS & GC Medal, for all eligible staff as is the case with other agencies that I have served,

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

NHS staff should be awarded a service medal for working through covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560402

Reward NHS Workers with a Long Service Medal: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333372
